name: Spell Casting: Meowgically Enhanced Edition
description: Spell Casting is a line drawing puzzle game in which you are a young wizard learning spells in the comfort of your home thanks to Wizardly Distance Education offered by the prestigious Magical Education Of Wizards School!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Newer than 2009 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: any onboard sound

reviews.review_text: Nice. A different kind of game, you have to practice drawing something and then remember how to do it in the 'exam' My kids liked it, but it starts getting difficult after the third book, if you're 7-8
Its a really fun simple little game, I really enjoy the artwork in it! I can't stop playing it!!!!
